meanings.definition: The state or quality of being suspenseful.
meanings.sent1: The suspensefulnesses of the movie kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent2: The suspensefulnesses of the book made it hard to put down.
meanings.sent3: The suspensefulnesses of waiting for the surprise party was thrilling.
meanings.sent4: The suspensefulnesses of the final moments felt like time stood still.
meanings.sent5: The suspensefulnesses of the unknown outcome lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: The feeling of excitement or tension experienced when awaiting an outcome.
meanings.sent1: The suspensefulnesses before the winner was announced was palpable.
meanings.sent2: The suspensefulnesses of waiting for exam results was nerve-wracking.
meanings.sent3: The suspensefulnesses of waiting for the cake to bake was oddly exhilarating.
meanings.sent4: The suspensefulnesses of the race made every heartbeat louder.
meanings.sent5: The suspensefulnesses of the decision hung heavy in the room.
